Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class WelcomeScreenController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.WelcomeScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class WelcomeScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the welcome screen.
